results.title: Snow safe
results.creator_credit: Jack Creswick and Australian Ski Patrol Association
results.brief_description: A well produced video looking at all aspects of ski and snow safety. Covers appropriate clothing and equipment, selection of equipment, getting proper ski instruction, ski slope courtesy and behaviour, using lifts, ski slope signs, what to do in case of accident or getting lost, care of children, food and hypothermia, and safe tobogganing. Narrated by Debbie Byrne.

Covers appropriate clothing and equipment, selection of equipment, getting proper ski instruction, ski slope courtesy and behaviour, using lifts, ski slope signs, what to do in case of accident or getting lost, care of children, food and hypothermia, and safe tobogganing. Narrated by Debbie Byrne.

results.title: Here's to Your health: std's
results.creator_credit: Craig Reardon, Robert Grant and Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit
results.brief_description: This program sets out to raise the awareness of issues regarding sexually transmitted diseases. It emphasizes the presentation of correct information and examines the transmission of STD’s and the prevention of all STD’s.

results.title: Chief telegraph office
results.brief_description: Uses period footage and oral history interviews to trace the 133 years of telegraphy in Victoria, from the Eureka stockade rebellion and the bombing of Darwin to the private joys and sorrows of births, deaths and marriages.
results.description: Uses period footage and oral history interviews to trace the 133 years of telegraphy in Victoria, from the Eureka stockade rebellion and the bombing of Darwin to the private joys and sorrows of births, deaths and marriages.

results.title: Better safe than sorry. - Revised edition
results.brief_description: Depicts situations that children could encounter with strangers, as well as with known adults, that involve physical and sexual abuse and shows children how to deal with these potential situations. Stresses that children are in no way to blame for the deviant behaviour of adults and should not feel guilty about their involvement in these situations. Presents three rules for children to follow: say no; get away; tell someone.
results.description: Depicts situations that children could encounter with strangers, as well as with known adults, that involve physical and sexual abuse and shows children how to deal with these potential situations. results.title: Hope is not a method (2nd revision)
results.creator_credit: Planned Parenthood Center of Syracuse and Wexler Film Productions
results.brief_description: Cites and describes nine contraceptive methods with anatomically explicit diagrams. States the advantages of withdrawal, rhythm, spermicidal chemicals, the cap, the condom, the diaphragm, the pill, the IUD and sterilization.

results.title: Beyond the frozen edge
results.brief_description: A compilation of 10 four minute programmes based on a 6 week trip by Rob Gell on the Antarctic supply vessel “Icebird” to the Australian Scientific Research Stations in Antarctica.

results.title: Senior Campus
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, George Cass and Victoria. Ministry of Education
results.brief_description: In panel interviews, staff, students and parents of two schools, Bendigo Senior High and Kurani College, Morwell, discuss issues related to planning, developing and running of a senior campus and a school complex with a senior campus.
